segment.source: Before you begin the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Setup, make sure that you meet the necessary prerequisites to install the product.
segment.target: Before you begin the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Setup, make sure that you meet the necessary prerequisites to install the product.

segment.source: This section contains information to help you successfully prepare your computing environment before you deploy the MBAM Clients and Server features.
segment.target: This section contains information to help you successfully prepare your computing environment before you deploy the MBAM Clients and Server features.

segment.source: Installation prerequisites for MBAM Server features
segment.target: Installation prerequisites for MBAM Server features

segment.source: Each of the MBAM server features has specific prerequisites that must be met before they can be successfully installed.
segment.target: Each of the MBAM server features has specific prerequisites that must be met before they can be successfully installed.

segment.source: MBAM Setup verifies if all prerequisites are met before the installation starts.
segment.target: MBAM Setup verifies if all prerequisites are met before the installation starts.

segment.source: Installation prerequisites for Administration and Monitoring Server
segment.target: Installation prerequisites for Administration and Monitoring Server

segment.source: The following table contains the installation prerequisites for the MBAM Administration and Monitoring Server:
segment.target: The following table contains the installation prerequisites for the MBAM Administration and Monitoring Server:

segment.source: This role must be added to a server operating system supported for the mbam Administration and Monitoring Server feature.
segment.target: This role must be added to a server operating system supported for the mbam Administration and Monitoring Server feature.

segment.source: For a list of supported operating systems, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.
segment.target: For a list of supported operating systems, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.

segment.source: Installation prerequisites for the Compliance and Audit Reports
segment.target: Installation prerequisites for the Compliance and Audit Reports

segment.source: The Compliance and Audit Reports must be installed on a supported version of SQL Server.
segment.target: The Compliance and Audit Reports must be installed on a supported version of SQL Server.

segment.source: Installation prerequisites for this feature include SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS).
segment.target: Installation prerequisites for this feature include SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS).

segment.source: SSRS must be installed and running during MBAM server installation.
segment.target: SSRS must be installed and running during MBAM server installation.

segment.source: SSRS should also be configured in “native” mode, not in the “unconfigured” or “SharePoint” mode.
segment.target: SSRS should also be configured in “native” mode, not in the “unconfigured” or “SharePoint” mode.

segment.source: For a list of supported operating systems and SQL Server versions, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.
segment.target: For a list of supported operating systems and SQL Server versions, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.

segment.source: Installation prerequisites for the Recovery and Hardware Database
segment.target: Installation prerequisites for the Recovery and Hardware Database

segment.source: The Recovery and Hardware Database must be installed on a supported version of SQL Server.
segment.target: The Recovery and Hardware Database must be installed on a supported version of SQL Server.

segment.source: SQL Server must have Database Engine Services installed and running during the MBAM server installation.
segment.target: SQL Server must have Database Engine Services installed and running during the MBAM server installation.

segment.source: The Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) feature must be enabled.
segment.target: The Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) feature must be enabled.

segment.source: For a list of supported operating systems and SQL Server versions, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.
segment.target: For a list of supported operating systems and SQL Server versions, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.

segment.source: The TDE SQL Server feature performs real-time input/output (I/O) encryption and decryption of the data and log files.
segment.target: The TDE SQL Server feature performs real-time input/output (I/O) encryption and decryption of the data and log files.

segment.source: TDE protects data that is "at rest,” which include the data and the log files.
segment.target: TDE protects data that is "at rest,” which include the data and the log files.

segment.source: It provides the ability to comply with many laws, regulations, and guidelines that are established in various industries.
segment.target: It provides the ability to comply with many laws, regulations, and guidelines that are established in various industries.

segment.source: Because TDE performs real-time decryption of database information, the recovery key information will be visible if the account under which you are logged in has permissions to the database when you view the recovery key information SQL tables.
segment.target: Because TDE performs real-time decryption of database information, the recovery key information will be visible if the account under which you are logged in has permissions to the database when you view the recovery key information SQL tables.

segment.source: Installation prerequisites for the Compliance and Audit Database
segment.target: Installation prerequisites for the Compliance and Audit Database

segment.source: The Compliance and Audit Database must be installed on a supported version of SQL Server.
segment.target: The Compliance and Audit Database must be installed on a supported version of SQL Server.

segment.source: SQL Server must have Database Engine Services installed and running during MBAM server installation.
segment.target: SQL Server must have Database Engine Services installed and running during MBAM server installation.

segment.source: For a list of supported operating systems and SQL Server versions, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.
segment.target: For a list of supported operating systems and SQL Server versions, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.

segment.source: The necessary prerequisites that you must meet before you begin the MBAM Client installation are the following:
segment.target: The necessary prerequisites that you must meet before you begin the MBAM Client installation are the following:

segment.source: The TPM chip must be turned on in the BIOS and it must be resettable from the operating system.
segment.target: The TPM chip must be turned on in the BIOS and it must be resettable from the operating system.

segment.source: For more information, see the BIOS documentation.
segment.target: For more information, see the BIOS documentation.

segment.source: Ensure that the keyboard, mouse, and video are directly connected to the computer, instead of to a keyboard, video, mouse (KVM) switch.
segment.target: Ensure that the keyboard, mouse, and video are directly connected to the computer, instead of to a keyboard, video, mouse (KVM) switch.

segment.source: A KVM switch can interfere with the ability of the computer to detect the physical presence of hardware.
segment.target: A KVM switch can interfere with the ability of the computer to detect the physical presence of hardware.
